title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: Pfizer Launches Pilot Program To Deliver Covid-19 Vaccine; Amazon Announces New Online Pharmacy Offering
author: Ed Silverman
description: Pfizer launched a pilot delivery program for its experimental Covid-19 vaccine in four U.S. states, as the drug maker seeks to address distribution challenges stemming from its ultra-cold storage requirements.
